alert.note: Alert for Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 19 at 6:31PM CDT until July 19 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR EASTERN THOMAS COUNTY... At 630 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Colby, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...The Automated Weather Observing Site in Colby measured a wind gust of 69 mph at 629 PM CDT. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Gem, Rexford and Menlo. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 49 and 68. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall with this storm may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
